title: Union bank
content: I created an account yesterday in union bank, how long does it take for it to get activated and I’m eligible for scholarship but haven’t received any mail regarding filling up the form yet but some have…

comments.body: For me it hardly took 3 to 4 days and 2 weeks to get registered for KYC so yes what's the mail you're talking about???
People got a mail regarding scholarship where you have to fill in the bank account details
Ou that they sent in our official WhatsApp group
